description: [``botocore``] EC2 Auto Scaling customers who use attribute based instance-type selection can now intuitively define their Spot instances price protection limit as a percentage of the lowest priced On-Demand instance type.
[``botocore``] Comprehend PII analysis now supports Spanish input documents.

[``botocore``] EC2 Fleet customers who use attribute based instance-type selection can now intuitively define their Spot instances price protection limit as a percentage of the lowest priced On-Demand instance type.
[``botocore``] This release adds MAINTENANCE environment status for Amazon MWAA environments.

[``botocore``] Introduced support for the InsufficientDBInstanceCapacityFault error in the RDS RestoreDBClusterFromSnapshot and RestoreDBClusterToPointInTime API methods. This provides enhanced error handling, ensuring a more robust experience.
[``botocore``] Modified description of createaddress to include direction to add path when providing a JSON file.
